name: Get to Work! (hamyah)
description:
Worker safety is a priority here at Nyle®️. We always ensure our workers are as safe as possible while working at mazimum efficiency! Come join us!

...

Ok, these 15 seconds were enough rest, get back to work!

------------

This game works on mobile!

Controls:

  • PC:
    • A/D or arrows to move left/right
    • Space to grab the boxes
    • While holding a box, Space to throw them in the direction you are facing!
  • Mobile
    • Left/Right side of the screen to move left/right
    • Hold the lower part of the screen to catch a box
    • Release the lower part of the screen to throw it!

------------

This game was made for ScoreSpace Jam #22.

All assets are my own.
